title: Roki Sasaki Rumors and Free Agency 2024-25
snippet:
MLB.com is keeping track of the latest news and rumors surrounding Japanese phenom Roki Sasaki, who is seeking an MLB opportunity via the posting system.
At 23 years old, Sasaki is subject to international bonus pool money restrictions, which are placed on foreign-born players unless they are at least 25

title: Sasaki met with 'set few' of 20 interested teams
snippet: The initial list of MLB teams that expressed interest in Roki Sasaki stretched to 20, with the talented young pitcher taking meetings with a "set few number" of those, his agent said Monday. Sasaki will make his decision between Jan. 15 and 23.

title: Roki Sasaki agrees to contract with Dodgers
snippet:
The most intriguing free agent of the offseason will wear Dodger Blue to begin his big league career.
Japanese phenom Roki Sasaki has agreed to sign with the Dodgers, he announced in a post on Instagram on Friday afternoon. The club sent out a release confirming the signing on Wednesday,

title: A few more clues about where Roki Sasaki might sign
snippet: It’s January and he’ll be on a MLB team by the end of this month.

title: What’s next for Roki Sasaki? Agent provides latest on coveted free agent
snippet: As it stands, Wolfe said he does not anticipate Sasaki signing on precisely Jan. 15 but at some point between Jan. 15 and Jan. 23.
